articles.title: Jamiroquai's Jay Kay quashes rumours he was at Capitol riot after fans joke about doppelganger - Sky News
articles.description: Jay Kay jokes about his pro-Trump lookalike after trending on Twitter, but says he most certainly wasn't there.

articles.author: Roxy Simons, Rianne Addo
articles.title: Sir David Attenborough reveals he will never return to Instagram - Daily Mail
articles.description: The broadcaster, 94, originally signed up back in September last year to issue a stark warning that 'the world is in trouble' with users, but promptly quit two months after he joined.
articles.content:
Sir David Attenborough has revealed he will never return to Instagram, after quitting the social media platform in November.
